description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests to add, update, or remove a device's static IP reservation in a router or network device. It validates IP addresses, checks conflicts, and updates configuration tables related to DHCP reservations and host entries.

methods.name: isIPValid
methods.description: Validates whether an input IP is within the valid range, not reserved for gateway or security, and not duplicate within DHCP reservations, returning a boolean and message.
